alert.note: Alert for Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 29 at 1:59PM PST until December 31 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM THURSDAY TO 4 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations around 4 inches with localized amounts up to 6 inches. * WHERE...Potlatch, Rosalia, Plummer, Colfax, Tekoa, Moscow, Genesee, Uniontown, La Crosse, Pullman, and Oakesdale. * WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to 4 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
